page.title: 01THORNHILL OUR BLOCK
page.content: The block we are studying is a rectangle 4km by 3km. The south west corner is located at grid reference 26406990 on the O.S. map no.57 Stirling and Trossachs. Thornhill is six miles from Callander, nine from Stirling and six from the Lake of Menteith, the only lake in Scotland. When the lake is frozen over people skate and have curling matches. Gartincaber Tower is said to be the centre of Scotland. It is just to the north east of our block.We have part of Flanders Moss in our rectangle and the whole of the village of Thornhill.There are 19 farm steadings in all,one being used as a fish smoke house.There are 481 people in the village of Thornhill and 93 in the neighbouring farms making a total population of 547.
